tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE smart_contracts (
    contract_id UUID,
    contract_name VARCHAR(255),
    contract_code TEXT,
    conditions JSON,
    actions JSON,
    blockchain_address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id),
    transaction_hash VARCHAR(255),
    transaction_status VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    sender_address VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    receiver_address VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(18, 2) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW(),
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES SmartContracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Conditions (
    condition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    condition_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    execution_script TEXT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES SmartContracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    log_message TEXT NOT NULL,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW(),
    FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SmartContracts (
    contract_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name STRING,
    contract_code STRING,
    contract_conditions JSON,
    contract_owner STRING
)

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id UUID,
    tx_amount DECIMAL,
    tx_status STRING,
    tx_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name STRING,
    user_public_key STRING,
    user_balance DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Blocks (
    block_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    block_hash STRING,
    block_parent_hash STRING,
    block_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    log_description STRING,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_type STRING,
    log_contract_id UUID
)
